thread.title: Mr Casanova! Here's how Papa Penny keeps that flame alive...
thread.title_full: Mr Casanova! Here's how Papa Penny keeps that flame alive...

title: Mr Casanova! Here's how Papa Penny keeps that flame alive...
text:
Tsek, cyclone Dineo! - here’s the only Dineos we care about 
The musician, who is known for his colourful character and hilarious antics had viewers rolling with laughter, as he treated his wife to a romantic dinner. 
From sharing tips on how to treat a woman to spoiling his wife with a traditional meal- Papa Penny had Twitter in frenzy. 
Guys, if you missed last night's episode best you jot down some notes, because Papa Penny's romance tips are sure to get you winning with your lady! 
Here's some of the musician's hottest tips... — Sphamandla Mkhize (@MandlaMkhize) February 15, 2017 Yes #PapaPennyAhee flowers for the what?.. pic.twitter.com/o3HaLou1iW — KENNETH_ (@Kennet_kk) February 16, 2017 
As usual Twitter was set alight with comments about Papa Penny's romantic side. #PapaPennyAhee very true to himself, I don't see him trying to fit in..nice one and a true Legend as well.. — CREDIBLE CHIPPA (@CredibleChippa) February 16, 2017 #PapaPennyAhee the sauce is appreciated even without flowers pic.twitter.com/neDXDqDBCb — VOICE OF TEMBISA FM (@votfm_876) February 16, 2017 You can't not love #PapaPennyAhee . He's the realist
